# grunt-asset-fingerprint

[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/testdouble/grunt-asset-fingerprint.png?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/testdouble/grunt-asset-fingerprint)

### Overview

```js
assetFingerprint: {
  options: {
    algorithm: 'md5',
  },
  dist: {
    src: ["dist/**/*"]
    dest: "dist/"
  },
}
```
## Running Specs

* clone this repo
* `npm install`
* `grunt spec`
